description:
Your Opportunity:
Alberta Precision Laboratories (APL) is hiring multiple Medical Laboratory Technologists throughout Alberta.
APL delivers high-quality, responsive diagnostic lab services to Albertans as a part of the provincial healthcare system. With competitive salaries, opportunities for professional development, and comprehensive benefits, you can truly thrive. Make a difference in your own community as you help healthcare professionals and patients get the information that they need to improve, optimize, or maintain health.
Come and join our diverse team and get the opportunity to utilize all of the skills and experiences you have gained through school. This is a working level position utilizing technical skills and judgment performing a diverse range of diagnostic procedures in the Clinical Chemistry, Hematology, Transfusion Medicine, and Specimen Procurement departments, within the scope of practice of a Medical Laboratory Technologist.
Join our professional and engaging team that encourages promoting a positive and respectful work environment consistent with the APL Values: kindness, inclusion, innovation, agility & accuracy.
Job Description:
As a Medical Laboratory Technologist (MLT) I, you will be responsible for the daily processing, testing, results analysis and reporting of diagnostic samples within the laboratory department. You will perform a variety of routine and specialized procedures in the processing of specimens used in diagnosis, treatment and research.
Qualifications:
Completion of an accredited Medical Laboratory Technology (MLT) program. Active or eligible for registration and practice permit with the College of Medical Laboratory Technologists of Alberta (CMLTA).
Job Types: Casual, Permanent, Part-time, Full-time, Fixed term contract
Salary: $34.75-$45.77 per hour
Benefits:

 Company pension
 Dental care
 Disability insurance
 Extended health care
 Life insurance
 Paid time off
 Vision care

Flexible Language Requirement:

 French not required

Schedule:

 Day shift
 Evening shift
 Night shift

Work Location: In person
